      • map

        public static int map(double x,
                      double in_min,
                      double in_max,
                      int out_min,
                      int out_max)
        ARDUINO map() refactor Re-maps a number from one range to another. That is, a value of fromLow would get mapped to toLow, a value of fromHigh to toHigh, values in-between to values in-between, etc.
        Parameters:
        x -
        in_min -
        in_max -
        out_min -
        out_max -
        Returns:
